title: How to Make an Origami Sailboat

steps.headline: Get a square piece of paper.
Fold it halfway like a half triangle.
Take the two sides and pull each one to the top one by one.
Take one part of the middle and pull to bottom.
Pull the two sides back up, one by one again.
Fold the turn part to the bottom, over the bottom half.
Fold over a little part of the end bottom for it to stand on.

text: Get a square piece of paper.  Fold it halfway like a half triangle.  Take the two sides and pull each one to the top one by one.  Pull them down.  Take one part of the middle and pull to bottom.  Pull the two sides back up, one by one again.  Turn it over.  Fold the turn part to the bottom, over the bottom half.  Fold over a little part of the end bottom for it to stand on.
sentences: Get a square piece of paper.
Fold it halfway like a half triangle.
Take the two sides and pull each one to the top one by one.
Take one part of the middle and pull to bottom.
Pull the two sides back up, one by one again.
Fold the turn part to the bottom, over the bottom half.
Fold over a little part of the end bottom for it to stand on.
